object_name.value: Find Documents rejected in Periodic WF

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution

property_page.value: Find Documents rejected in Periodic review

repeating.value: Find Documents rejected in Periodic Workflow

dql_value.value: select d.r_object_id, d.object_name, d.title, a.user_name as Acknowledged_By, a.time_stamp as Acknowledged_On from cd_quality_gmp_effective d, dm_audittrail a where a.event_name='d2_workflow_forwarded_task' and a.audited_obj_id = d.r_object_id and d.r_object_type='cd_quality_gmp_effective' and d.a_status in ('Effective', 'Suspended') and any d.r_version_label not in (' ','CURRENT') and a.string_1 like '%has received comments from Periodic Review.' enable(ROW_BASED)
